messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a swarm of [REDACTED] have migrated into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
CONGRATULATIONS!

Your station has won our annual bar creation contest, and our annual brutal pirate murder contest!

Feel free to message us to redeem prizes of your choice!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: No problemo.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Yo what else you want?

I dunno man I'm pretty feeling gooooooooood here.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Detective's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Director's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Bow Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies dete'fZ\kg5_0-BZZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cap before you run off you retard, I was gonna give you your space id

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Party levels too high. Shuttle docking impossible.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I have a joke. A man is sitting next to a widow at her husband's funeral. He asks, "Can I say a word?" The woman says yes. The man replies, "Plethora." The woman said, "Thank you, that means a lot."

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mining Dock.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Unknown. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Berna Mandys P.I (Detective)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Very sexy shit right here.</font>

messages.author: Berna Mandys P.I (Detective)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Even sexier</font>

messages.author: Captain (Captain)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Please stop before you're arrested Detective.</font>

messages.author: Lara Black (Assistant)
messages.body:
We live in a society,
-Said no one ever
